#Text=Chelsea beats Arsenal in Carling Cup
#Text=Monday , February 26 , 2007
#Text=Chelsea FC
#Text=2
#Text=1
#Text=Arsenal FC
#Text=Match Stats
#Text=Attendance

#Text=70073 Goalscorers for Chelsea FC Didier Drogba ( 20 ) , Didier Drogba ( 84 ) Goalscorers for Arsenal FC Theo Walcott ( 12 ) Bookings ( Chelsea FC ) Essien , Carvalho , Diarra , Lampard ( Yellow ( 4 ) ) , Mikel ( Red(1 ) ) Bookings ( Arsenal FC ) Denilson , Eboue , Fabregas ( Yellow ( 3 ) ) , Toure , Adebayor ( Red(2 ) )
#Text=A heated showdown occurred in the all London Carling Cup final yesterday at Millennium Stadium .
#Text=Chelsea fielded a full strength side , including Andriy Shevchenko , Michael Ballack , Didier Drogba , and skipper John Terry .
#Text=Arsenal on the other hand fielded a young side , including
#Text=Theo Walcott
#Text=, Cesc Fabregas , Jeremie Aliadiere , and Justin Hoyte .
#Text=Despite their apparent lack of experience , Arsenal started out the match strongly , with crisp passing and great control .
#Text=They pressed their advantage , and forced Chelsea keeper Petr Cech into several saves .
#Text=On 12 minutes , Theo Walcott struck gold , as he orcestrated a give and go with Abou Diaby and slotted the ball into the far corner of the net , scoring his first ever goal for the Gunners .
#Text=Soon after , Baptista of Arsenal had a legitimate claim for a penalty , but referee Howard Webb would n't hear of it .
#Text=Chelsea struck back quickly , and a hint of offside was shown as Didier Drogba was played in by an over the top ball by Michael Ballack .
#Text=The Ivory Coast striker did n't wait for a whistle , and slotted the ball between Manuel Almunia 's legs to tie the match .
#Text=A few more chances were spurned due to poor finishing before the break , but the game went into halftime drawn at one a piece .
#Text=The second half started much as the first , with the youthful exuberance of Arsenal showing through , as they continued to press .
#Text=Chelsea 's output was increased as well however , with the addition of Arjen Robben at the exspense of Makelele .
#Text=2 yellow cards were handed out to Chelsea in the next few minutes , before the game took a huge downturn .
#Text=Chelsea skipper
#Text=John Terry was seriously injured , when Diaby 's foot connected squarly with his face as Diaby attempted to clear the ball .
#Text=Terry was taken off in a stretcher and was replaced by Mikel .
#Text=The loss of their captain seemed to push Chelsea to new levels , as Drogba forced a fine save out of Almunia , and Lampard saw his shot go off the woodwork .
#Text=Arsenal were not able to hold on , and on 81 minutes , Denilson made a sloppy pass and Robben picked up the scraps .
#Text=He sent a cross in as Drogba beat Senderos to the ball and headed in his 28th of the campaign .
#Text=The blue tide continued , and Shevchenko blasted a ball off the woodwork , missing his chance to seal the victory .
#Text=As the game entered stoppage time , Mikel and Toure entered a shoving match , and more players got involved .
#Text=Coaches took the field to attempt to settle their players , and when all was finally calm , Mikel and Toure were shown red cards , along with Adebayor of Arsenal .
#Text=The game was finally called at 101 minutes , and stand in skipper Lampard was able to hoist the Carling Cup .
